name: OMG! Super Penguin Can Skate! -Penguin Skater Racing Club
name_original: OMG! Super Penguin Can Skate! -Penguin Skater Racing Club
description:
*** BE CAREFUL: ONLY FOR PRO GAMER ***

Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?
The new skater penguin is now on your iPhone, iPod and iPad!

Tap on your device to make skater penguin jump. Avoid obstacles to level up. Win fantastic trophies to pimp skater penguin up... But most importantly... Smash your friends high score.

Have fun
